channel.title: Prompt Engineering on Rotational Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Prompt Engineering on Rotational Labs

item.title: Why Your AI Prompts Aren't Working: The Gap Between Intention and Output
item.description: Writing prompts has often made me feel like I’m learning a new language. Though I’m not, the responses I get aren’t always what I expect.

item.title: Prompts: The Key to Steering Agents
item.description: AI agents have the ability to complete tasks autonomously, but without clear, well-structured prompts, they stumble. Prompt engineering helps bridge the gap between potential and performance.
